data.name: Sample - Fortinet FortiDDoS - 1.0.0
data.description: FortiDDoS Protection Solution defends enterprise data centers against DDoS attacks by leveraging an extensive collection of known DDoS methodologies, creating a multi-layered approach to mitigate attacks.  It also analyzes the behavior of data to detect new attacks, allowing it to stop zero-day threats.

workflows.description: Retrieves the Protection Profiles details from FortiDDoS appliance of the given SPP name.
workflows.name: Get Protection Profiles

workflows.description: Update Service Protection Profile (SPP) settings based on the inputs provided.
workflows.name: Update SPP Settings

workflows.description: Retrieves settings from the global settings (Global Settings > Settings > Settings) of the FortiDDoS appliance.
workflows.name: Get Global Settings

workflows.description: Retrieves the global service protection profile (Global Settings > Service Protection Profiles) details from the FortiDDoS appliance.
workflows.name: Get Global Service Protection Profiles

arguments.title: Fortinet FortiDDoS: Get Global Service Protection Profiles

routes.name: Start-> Get Global Service Protection Profiles

workflows.description: Retrieves the internal sub resources from settings of the FortiDDoS global settings.
workflows.name: Get Settings

workflows.description: Retrieves the global setting address of the FortiDDoS appliance.
workflows.name: Get Global Settings Address

arguments.title: Fortinet FortiDDoS: Get Global Settings Address

workflows.description: Retrieves the IP reputation details of the FortiDDoS appliance.
workflows.name: Get IP Reputation

workflows.description: Retrieves the Domain reputation details of the FortiDDoS appliance.

workflows.description: Retrieves the proxy IP details of the FortiDDoS appliance.

workflows.description: Retrieves the global settings of the FortiDDoS appliance.
workflows.name: Get Do Not Track Policy

workflows.description: Retrieves the access control list details of global settings from the FortiDDoS appliance.

workflows.description: Retrieves the bypass MAC details of the FortiDDoS appliance.
workflows.name: Get Bypass MAC

workflows.description: Retrieves the system settings information from FortiDDoS.
workflows.name: Get System Settings

workflows.description: Retrieves log information from the FortiDDoS.
workflows.name: Get Log Settings

workflows.description: Retrieves attack information from FortiDDoS based on the SPP, Direction and Period you have specified.
workflows.name: Get Attack Information

workflows.description: Add a new Distress ACL in FortiDDoS based on the parameters you have specified.
workflows.name: Add Distress ACL

workflows.description: Get list of Service Protection Profile Policy or specific policy details based on the given policy name.

workflows.name: Delete Service Protection Profile Policy

workflows.description: Adds a new Legitimate DNS Query to the FortiDDoS based on the input parameters you have specified.
workflows.name: Add Legitimate DNS Query
